quotes.quote: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
quotes.author: Charles Kingsleigh

quotes.quote: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
quotes.author: Robert Collier

quotes.quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.quote: Your limitation—it's only your imagination.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Great things never come from comfort zones.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Dream it. Wish it. Do it.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Success doesn't just find you. You have to go out and get it.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The key to success is to focus on goals, not obstacles.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The only person you should try to be better than is the person you were yesterday.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The question isn't who is going to let me; it's who is going to stop me.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: When you feel like quitting, remember why you started.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Don't count the days, make the days count.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: If opportunity doesn't knock, build a door.
quotes.author: Milton Berle

quotes.quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

quotes.quote: Your attitude determines your direction.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: What are you afraid of losing when nothing in the world actually belongs to you.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Act as though it is impossible to fail.
quotes.author: Dorothea Brande

quotes.quote: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
quotes.author: Chris Grosser

quotes.quote: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: All progress takes place outside the comfort zone.
quotes.author: Michael John Bobak

quotes.quote: Don't stop when you're tired. Stop when you're done.
quotes.author: Wesley Snipes

quotes.quote: I never dreamed about success. I worked for it.
quotes.author: Estée Lauder

quotes.quote: Difficulties in life are intended to make us better, not bitter.
quotes.author: Dan Reeves

quotes.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Every accomplishment starts with the decision to try.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: There are no limits to what you can accomplish, except the limits you place on your own thinking.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Stay away from those who try to belittle your ambitions. Small people always do that.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: Be so good they can’t ignore you.
quotes.author: Steve Martin

quotes.quote: You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Work hard in silence, let your success be your noise.
quotes.author: Frank Ocean

quotes.quote: Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: Don’t be pushed by your problems. Be led by your dreams.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: A little progress each day adds up to big results.
quotes.author: Satya Nani

quotes.quote: Pain is temporary. Quitting lasts forever.
quotes.author: Lance Armstrong

quotes.quote: Discipline is choosing between what you want now and what you want most.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Energy and persistence conquer all things.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Rise above the storm, and you will find the sunshine.
quotes.author: Mario Fernández

quotes.quote: If you want to fly, give up everything that weighs you down.
quotes.author: Toni Morrison

quotes.quote: Hustle until your haters ask if you're hiring.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: You can waste your life drawing lines. Or you can live your life crossing them.
quotes.author: Shonda Rhimes

quotes.quote: A goal properly set is halfway reached.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot, but make it hot by striking.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.quote: Small deeds done are better than great deeds planned.
quotes.author: Peter Marshall

quotes.quote: Never regret a day in your life. Good days give happiness, bad days give experience.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Make each day your masterpiece.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: The man on top of the mountain didn’t fall there.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Ambition is the first step to success. The second step is action.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A winner is a dreamer who never gives up.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Do what you love and you’ll never work a day in your life.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Dare to live the life you have dreamed for yourself. Go forward and make your dreams come true.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Make your fear of losing your greatest motivation.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Work like there is someone working twenty-four hours a day to take it away from you.
quotes.author: Mark Cuban

quotes.quote: Success is not just about making money. It’s about making a difference.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

quotes.quote: If your dreams don’t scare you, they are too small.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Don't wait. The time will never be just right.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Opportunities don't happen, you create them.
quotes.author: Chris Grosser

quotes.quote: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot, but make it hot by striking.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.quote: Success is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.
quotes.author: Bo Bennett

quotes.quote: There are no shortcuts to any place worth going.
quotes.author: Beverly Sills

quotes.quote: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: The secret of success is to do the common things uncommonly well.
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.quote: Success isn't always about greatness. It's about consistency.
quotes.author: Dwayne Johnson

quotes.quote: The difference between who you are and who you want to be is what you do.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Success is liking yourself, liking what you do, and liking how you do it.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: The path to success is to take massive, determined action.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Your positive action combined with positive thinking results in success.
quotes.author: Shiv Khera

quotes.quote: Success is getting what you want. Happiness is wanting what you get.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Fall seven times and stand up eight.
quotes.author: Japanese Proverb

quotes.quote: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
quotes.author: Vidal Sassoon

quotes.quote: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.quote: Success is a journey, not a destination.
quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

quotes.quote: If you want to be successful, prepare to be doubted and tested.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

quotes.quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Success is not just about making money. It's about making a difference.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: If people are doubting how far you can go, go so far that you can’t hear them anymore.
quotes.author: Michele Ruiz

quotes.quote: Success is not measured by what you accomplish, but by the opposition you have encountered.
quotes.author: Booker T. Washington

quotes.quote: It is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitation.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.quote: Behind every successful person are a lot of unsuccessful years.
quotes.author: Bob Brown

quotes.quote: A successful man is one who can lay a firm foundation with the bricks others have thrown at him.
quotes.author: David Brinkley

quotes.quote: Success seems to be connected with action. Successful people keep moving.
quotes.author: Conrad Hilton

quotes.quote: Do what you love and success will follow. Passion is the fuel behind a successful career.
quotes.author: Meg Whitman

quotes.quote: A goal without a plan is just a wish.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: Success is how high you bounce when you hit bottom.
quotes.author: George S. Patton

quotes.quote: Don’t let the fear of losing be greater than the excitement of winning.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: Be brave. Take risks. Nothing can substitute experience.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Success is 10% inspiration and 90% perspiration.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.quote: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: Courage is resistance to fear, mastery of fear—not absence of fear.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Patience, persistence, and perspiration make an unbeatable combination for success.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Success is simple. Do what's right, the right way, at the right time.
quotes.author: Arnold H. Glasow

quotes.quote: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.quote: Some people dream of success, while others wake up and work hard at it.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Success is about creating benefit for all and enjoying the process.
quotes.author: Jack Ma

quotes.quote: If you’re going through hell, keep going.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: There is no elevator to success. You have to take the stairs.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: One secret of success is to refuse to let temporary setbacks defeat you.
quotes.author: Mary Kay Ash

quotes.quote: You may have to fight a battle more than once to win it.
quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

quotes.quote: Work like hell. I mean you just have to put in 80 to 100 hour weeks every week.
quotes.author: Elon Musk

quotes.quote: Success does not consist in never making mistakes but in never making the same one a second time.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Champions keep playing until they get it right.
quotes.author: Billie Jean King

quotes.quote: Success is best when it’s shared.
quotes.author: Howard Schultz

quotes.quote: Dream big and dare to fail.
quotes.author: Norman Vaughan

quotes.quote: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Success comes from having dreams that are bigger than your fears.
quotes.author: Bobby Unser

quotes.quote: Forget about style; worry about results.
quotes.author: Bobby Orr

quotes.quote: It's not about money or connections—it's the willingness to outwork and outlearn everyone.
quotes.author: Mark Cuban

quotes.quote: If you do what you’ve always done, you’ll get what you’ve always gotten.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Don’t count the days, make the days count.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: Success is dependent on effort.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: Work hard, be kind, and amazing things will happen.
quotes.author: Conan O'Brien

quotes.quote: Success isn't just about what you accomplish, it's about what you inspire others to do.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: For every minute you are angry, you lose sixty seconds of happiness.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The purpose of life is not to be happy. It is to be useful, to be honorable, to be compassionate, to have it make some difference that you have lived and lived well.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Happiness depends upon ourselves.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The happiest people don't have the best of everything, they just make the best of everything.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: You will never be happy if you continue to search for what happiness consists of. You will never live if you are looking for the meaning of life.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Happiness is a warm puppy.
quotes.author: Charles M. Schulz

quotes.quote: Be happy for this moment. This moment is your life.
quotes.author: Omar Khayyam

quotes.quote: To be happy, we must not be too concerned with others.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: The greatest happiness you can have is knowing that you do not necessarily require happiness.
quotes.author: William Saroyan

quotes.quote: Happiness is not by chance, but by choice.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: The most important thing is to enjoy your life—to be happy—it's all that matters.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: Happiness is a direction, not a place.
quotes.author: Sydney J. Harris

quotes.quote: The art of being happy lies in the power of extracting happiness from common things.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Count your age by friends, not years. Count your life by smiles, not tears.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: Happiness is letting go of what you think your life is supposed to look like.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The secret of happiness is not in doing what one likes, but in liking what one does.
quotes.author: James M. Barrie

quotes.quote: Happiness is not something you postpone for the future; it is something you design for the present.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: If you want to be happy, set a goal that commands your thoughts, liberates your energy, and inspires your hopes.
quotes.author: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.quote: The foolish man seeks happiness in the distance; the wise grows it under his feet.
quotes.author: James Oppenheim

quotes.quote: Happiness is the highest good.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Happiness grows at our own firesides and is not to be picked in strangers' gardens.
quotes.author: Douglas Jerrold

quotes.quote: A joyful heart is the inevitable result of a heart burning with love.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Happiness is not a goal; it is a by-product.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The secret of happiness is freedom, and the secret of freedom is courage.
quotes.author: Thucydides

quotes.quote: Happiness is contagious, spread it as much as you can.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The best way to cheer yourself is to try to cheer someone else up.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Happiness is not in things; it is in us.
quotes.author: Richard Wagner

quotes.quote: True happiness is not attained through self-gratification, but through fidelity to a worthy purpose.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: The happiest people don't necessarily have the best of everything, but they make the best of everything.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Happiness is an inside job.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: Happiness is a choice that requires effort at times.
quotes.author: Aeschylus

quotes.quote: The key to being happy is knowing you have the power to choose what to accept and what to let go.
quotes.author: Dodinsky

quotes.quote: Happiness is like a butterfly; the more you chase it, the more it will elude you.
quotes.author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quotes.quote: Happiness comes in waves. It’ll find you again.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Happiness is not out there, it's in you.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A happy heart makes a cheerful face.
quotes.author: Proverbs 15:13

quotes.quote: The greatest happiness you can give to others is your own happiness.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: It is not how much we have, but how much we enjoy, that makes happiness.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: A truly happy person is one who can enjoy the scenery on a detour.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Happiness is found in the simplest of things.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Do more of what makes you happy.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: There is no path to happiness: happiness is the path.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Happiness is the art of never holding in your mind the memory of any unpleasant thing that has passed.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Happiness is not having what you want. It is appreciating what you have.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Find joy in the ordinary.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Happiness radiates like a fragrance from a flower and draws all good things towards you.
quotes.author: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi

quotes.quote: Enjoy the little things, for one day you may look back and realize they were the big things.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: Happiness is a cup of coffee and a good book.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Happiness often sneaks in through a door you didn’t know you left open.
quotes.author: John Barrymore

quotes.quote: Happiness is not in another place but this place, not for another hour but this hour.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: Happiness is a state of mind. It's just according to the way you look at things.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Happiness is homemade.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Happiness comes when we stop complaining about the troubles we have and offer thanks for all the troubles we don’t have.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Happiness is not found in achieving great things, but in the journey of becoming.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Happiness is not the absence of problems, it’s the ability to deal with them.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Happiness is not having a perfect life, but seeing the beauty in an imperfect one.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Being happy never goes out of style.
quotes.author: Lilly Pulitzer

quotes.quote: Happiness starts with a smile.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Collect beautiful moments, not things.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Let your smile change the world, but don’t let the world change your smile.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Find happiness in the simplest of moments.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Happiness is the joy of discovering your own path.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The happiest people make the best of everything.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Happiness is knowing when to let go and move forward.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Happiness is free. Sprinkle it everywhere.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.
quotes.author: David Viscott

quotes.quote: Love is when the other person's happiness is more important than your own.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

quotes.quote: You don't love someone because they're perfect, you love them in spite of the fact that they're not.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: Love is a many-splendored thing.
quotes.author: Paul Simon

quotes.quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Love is not about how many days, months, or years you have been together. Love is about how much you love each other every day.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Love is like the wind, you can't see it but you can feel it.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: Love isn't something you find. Love is something that finds you.
quotes.author: Loretta Young

quotes.quote: The best love is the kind that awakens the soul and makes us reach for more.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: A loving heart is the truest wisdom.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: Love is an untamed force. When we try to control it, it destroys us. When we try to imprison it, it enslaves us.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: We accept the love we think we deserve.
quotes.author: Stephen Chbosky

quotes.quote: Love is the flower you've got to let grow.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: I have decided to stick with love. Hate is too great a burden to bear.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: Love doesn't make the world go round. Love is what makes the ride worthwhile.
quotes.author: Franklin P. Jones

quotes.quote: All you need is love. But a little chocolate now and then doesn't hurt.
quotes.author: Charles M. Schulz

quotes.quote: Life is the flower for which love is the honey.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: The greatest happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved; loved for ourselves, or rather, loved in spite of ourselves.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Love is the beauty of the soul.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.quote: Love is not only something you feel, it is something you do.
quotes.author: David Wilkerson

quotes.quote: Love is the bridge between you and everything.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: To love oneself is the beginning of a lifelong romance.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Love takes off masks that we fear we cannot live without and know we cannot live within.
quotes.author: James Baldwin

quotes.quote: Love is the only force capable of transforming an enemy into a friend.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: True love stories never have endings.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: Love is a friendship set to music.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: The best proof of love is trust.
quotes.author: Joyce Brothers

quotes.quote: The way to love anything is to realize that it may be lost.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Love is the greatest refreshment in life.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: To love and be loved is to feel the warmth of the sun on both sides.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Love does not dominate; it cultivates.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Love is that condition in which the happiness of another person is essential to your own.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: Love cures people—both the ones who give it and the ones who receive it.
quotes.author: Karl A. Menninger

quotes.quote: Love is not about possession. It’s all about appreciation.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Where there is love, there is life.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Love is the strongest force the world possesses.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Love is the magician that pulls man out of his own hat.
quotes.author: Ben Hecht

quotes.quote: Love is something eternal; the aspect may change, but not the essence.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: If I had a flower for every time I thought of you, I could walk through my garden forever.
quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.quote: Love is like a flower; it needs the right amount of attention and care to grow.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Love is a language spoken by everyone but understood only by the heart.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A life without love is like a year without summer.
quotes.author: Swedish Proverb

quotes.quote: Love is not about finding the right person, but creating the right relationship.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: To love is nothing. To be loved is something. But to love and be loved, that’s everything.
quotes.author: T. Tolis

quotes.quote: Love is like the sun, it shines brightly even on the darkest days.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Love is like a puzzle. When you're in love, all the pieces fit.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Love is the answer, and you know that for sure.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: Love recognizes no barriers. It jumps hurdles, leaps fences, and penetrates walls.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Love is a canvas furnished by nature and embroidered by imagination.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Love is the greatest adventure.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Love is not what the mind thinks, but what the heart feels.
quotes.author: Greg Evans

quotes.quote: If you love someone, set them free. If they come back, they’re yours; if they don’t, they never were.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: The best love is unexpected. You don’t just pick someone and cross your fingers it’ll work out.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Love is a journey, not a destination.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Love never fails.
quotes.author: 1 Corinthians 13:8

quotes.quote: The first duty of love is to listen.
quotes.author: Paul Tillich

quotes.quote: Love is an endless act of forgiveness.
quotes.author: Peter Ustinov

quotes.quote: Love is when you meet someone who tells you something new about yourself.
quotes.author: Andre Breton

quotes.quote: Love is a gift you can give every day.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Love grows by giving. The love we give away is the only love we keep.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: True love is eternal, infinite, and always like itself.
quotes.author: Honore de Balzac

quotes.quote: Love does not consist in gazing at each other, but in looking outward together in the same direction.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: We love because it’s the only true adventure.
quotes.author: Nikki Giovanni

quotes.quote: Love is the key to the secret of life.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The greatest thing you’ll ever learn is just to love and be loved in return.
quotes.author: Nat King Cole

quotes.quote: Perseverance is not a long race; it is many short races one after the other.
quotes.author: Walter Elliot

quotes.quote: Success is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather a lack in will.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Perseverance is the key to overcoming obstacles.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A quitter never wins and a winner never quits.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: The road to success is dotted with many tempting parking spaces.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Perseverance is failing 19 times and succeeding the 20th.
quotes.author: Julie Andrews

quotes.quote: Don't give up. Don't ever give up.
quotes.author: Jim Valvano

quotes.quote: The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Patience, persistence, and perspiration make an unbeatable combination for success.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Fall seven times, stand up eight.
quotes.author: Japanese Proverb

quotes.quote: Rivers know this: there is no hurry. We shall get there some day.
quotes.author: A.A. Milne

quotes.quote: The only guarantee for failure is to stop trying.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: When you come to the end of your rope, tie a knot and hang on.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.quote: I am not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: The brick walls are there for a reason. They're not there to keep us out. The brick walls are there to give us a chance to show how badly we want something.
quotes.author: Randy Pausch

quotes.quote: Character consists of what you do on the third and fourth tries.
quotes.author: James A. Michener

quotes.quote: Perseverance is not a long race; it is many short races one after the other.
quotes.author: Walter Elliot

quotes.quote: I am not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: The brick walls are there for a reason. They're not there to keep us out. The brick walls are there to give us a chance to show how badly we want something.
quotes.author: Randy Pausch

quotes.quote: Character consists of what you do on the third and fourth tries.
quotes.author: James A. Michener

quotes.quote: Perseverance is the hard work you do after you get tired of doing the hard work you already did.
quotes.author: Newt Gingrich

quotes.quote: Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: I am convinced that about half of what separates successful entrepreneurs from non-successful ones is pure perseverance.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Through perseverance, many people win success out of what seemed destined to be certain failure.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: Perseverance is the mother of good luck.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Courage doesn't always roar. Sometimes courage is the quiet voice at the end of the day saying, 'I will try again tomorrow.'
quotes.author: Mary Anne Radmacher

quotes.quote: There is no failure except in no longer trying.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Victory belongs to the most persevering.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: Great works are performed not by strength but by perseverance.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Perseverance, secret of all triumphs.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: If you fell down yesterday, stand up today.
quotes.author: H.G. Wells

quotes.quote: The secret to success is constancy to purpose.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: Energy and persistence conquer all things.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Perseverance is another word for faith.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.quote: Most people never run far enough on their first wind to find out they've got a second.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: A little more persistence, a little more effort, and what seemed hopeless failure may turn to glorious success.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Every strike brings me closer to the next home run.
quotes.author: Babe Ruth

quotes.quote: I'm convinced that about half of what separates successful people from the non-successful ones is pure perseverance.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Do not be embarrassed by your failures, learn from them and start again.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: To reach a port, we must sail—sail, not tie at anchor—sail, not drift.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: You may have to fight a battle more than once to win it.
quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

quotes.quote: Perseverance is the courage to ignore the obvious wisdom of turning back.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The secret of our success is that we never, never give up.
quotes.author: Wilma Mankiller

quotes.quote: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: A river cuts through rock, not because of its power, but because of its persistence.
quotes.author: Jim Watkins

quotes.quote: Focus on the journey, not the destination.
quotes.author: Greg Anderson

quotes.quote: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
quotes.author: Robert Collier

quotes.quote: You can't depend on your eyes when your imagination is out of focus.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The best way to predict your future is to create it.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Concentration is the secret of strength.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Focus on being productive instead of busy.
quotes.author: Tim Ferriss

quotes.quote: Focus is the key to unlocking your potential.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: You cannot swim for new horizons until you have courage to lose sight of the shore.
quotes.author: William Faulkner

quotes.quote: Focus on the possibilities for success, not on the potential for failure.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Where focus goes, energy flows.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Concentrate all your thoughts upon the work in hand. The sun's rays do not burn until brought to a focus.
quotes.author: Alexander Graham Bell

quotes.quote: The main thing is to keep the main thing the main thing.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: Your focus determines your reality.
quotes.author: George Lucas

quotes.quote: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: You will never reach your destination if you stop and throw stones at every dog that barks.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Focus is a matter of deciding what things you're not going to do.
quotes.author: John Carmack

quotes.quote: What you stay focused on will grow.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: Focus on the solution, not the problem.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Don't confuse movement with progress. A rocking horse keeps moving but doesn't make any progress.
quotes.author: Alfred A. Montapert

quotes.quote: Focus on the journey, not the destination.
quotes.author: Greg Anderson

quotes.quote: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.

quotes.quote: What you stay focused on will grow.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: Focus on the solution, not the problem.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Don't confuse movement with progress. A rocking horse keeps moving but doesn't make any progress.
quotes.author: Alfred A. Montapert

quotes.quote: Energy flows where attention goes.
quotes.author: Michael Beckwith

quotes.quote: It is not enough to be busy… The question is: What are we busy about?
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The ability to focus attention on important things is a defining characteristic of intelligence.
quotes.author: Robert J. Shiller

quotes.quote: An eagle never loses sleep over the opinion of pigeons.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: Lack of direction, not lack of time, is the problem. We all have twenty-four hour days.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Always remember, your focus determines your reality.
quotes.author: Qui-Gon Jinn (Star Wars)

quotes.quote: Simplicity is about subtracting the obvious and adding the meaningful.
quotes.author: John Maeda

quotes.quote: Don’t let the noise of others’ opinions drown out your own inner voice.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: The key to success is to focus our conscious mind on things we desire, not things we fear.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Focus means eliminating distractions, not just ignoring them.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: He who chases two rabbits catches neither.
quotes.author: Russian Proverb

quotes.quote: A clear vision, backed by definite plans, gives you a tremendous feeling of confidence and personal power.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: When you have clarity of intention, the universe conspires with you to make it happen.
quotes.author: Fabienne Fredrickson

quotes.quote: Your results are the product of either personal focus or personal distractions. The choice is yours.
quotes.author: John Di Lemme

quotes.quote: The successful person has the habit of doing the things failures don’t like to do.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.quote: The art of being wise is the art of knowing what to overlook.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Do more of what matters and let the rest go.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The first requisite for success is the ability to apply your physical and mental energies to one problem incessantly without growing weary.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.quote: Decide what you want, decide what you are willing to exchange for it. Establish your priorities and go to work.
quotes.author: H.L. Hunt

quotes.quote: A goal properly set is halfway reached.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Successful people maintain a positive focus in life no matter what is going on around them.
quotes.author: Jack Canfield

quotes.quote: You don’t need more time in your day. You need to decide.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: Leadership is not about being in charge. It's about taking care of those in your charge.
quotes.author: Simon Sinek

quotes.quote: A good leader leads the people from above them. A great leader leads the people from within them.
quotes.author: Mabel Newcomer

quotes.quote: Leadership is the capacity to translate vision into reality.
quotes.author: Warren Bennis

quotes.quote: The quality of a leader is reflected in the standards they set for themselves.
quotes.author: Ray Kroc

quotes.quote: Leadership is not about being the best. It's about making everyone else better.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A true leader doesn't create followers, they create more leaders.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Leadership is not about being the boss, it's about showing the way.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Leadership is about influence, not authority.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Leadership is the ability to get extraordinary achievement from ordinary people.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: The greatest leader is not necessarily the one who does the greatest things. He is the one that gets the people to do the greatest things.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Leadership is unlocking people's potential to become better.
quotes.author: Bill Bradley

quotes.quote: A leader is one who knows the way, goes the way, and shows the way.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: You don't lead by pointing and telling people where to go. You lead by going to that place and making a case.
quotes.author: Ken Kesey

quotes.quote: The challenge of leadership is to be strong, but not rude; be kind, but not weak; be bold, but not bully; be thoughtful, but not lazy; be humble, but not timid; be proud, but not arrogant.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Leadership is the art of giving people a platform for spreading ideas that work.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: Great leaders are not defined by the absence of weakness, but rather by the presence of clear strengths.
quotes.author: John Zenger

quotes.quote: The function of leadership is to produce more leaders, not more followers.
quotes.author: Ralph Nader

quotes.quote: The key to successful leadership is influence, not authority.
quotes.author: Kenneth H. Blanchard

quotes.quote: Leadership is not about being in charge. It's about taking care of those in your charge.
quotes.author: Simon Sinek

quotes.quote: A good leader leads the people from above them. A great leader leads the people from within them.

quotes.author: Ken Kesey

quotes.quote: The challenge of leadership is to be strong, but not rude; be kind, but not weak; be bold, but not bully; be thoughtful, but not lazy; be humble, but not timid; be proud, but not arrogant.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Leadership is the art of giving people a platform for spreading ideas that work.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: Great leaders are not defined by the absence of weakness, but rather by the presence of clear strengths.
quotes.author: John Zenger

quotes.quote: The function of leadership is to produce more leaders, not more followers.
quotes.author: Ralph Nader

quotes.quote: The key to successful leadership is influence, not authority.
quotes.author: Kenneth H. Blanchard

quotes.quote: To handle yourself, use your head; to handle others, use your heart.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Do what you feel in your heart to be right–for you'll be criticized anyway.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: A leader takes people where they want to go. A great leader takes people where they don’t necessarily want to go, but ought to be.
quotes.author: Rosalynn Carter

quotes.quote: True leaders understand that leadership is not about them but about those they serve.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The task of the leader is to get their people from where they are to where they have not been.
quotes.author: Henry Kissinger

quotes.quote: The function of a leader is to produce more leaders, not more followers.
quotes.author: Ralph Nader

quotes.quote: Great leaders are willing to sacrifice their own personal interests for the good of the team.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: Leadership and learning are indispensable to each other.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: People ask the difference between a leader and a boss. The leader leads, and the boss drives.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: A great person attracts great people and knows how to hold them together.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Leadership is not about titles, positions, or flowcharts. It is about one life influencing another.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: If your actions inspire others to dream more, learn more, do more, and become more, you are a leader.
quotes.author: John Quincy Adams

quotes.quote: Earn your leadership every day.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: Effective leadership is not about making speeches or being liked; leadership is defined by results, not attributes.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: A leader is best when people barely know he exists, when his work is done, his aim fulfilled, they will say: we did it ourselves.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: A true leader has the confidence to stand alone, the courage to make tough decisions, and the compassion to listen to the needs of others.
quotes.author: Douglas MacArthur

quotes.quote: Leadership is not a position or title, it is action and example.
quotes.author: Cory Booker

quotes.quote: The speed of the leader is the speed of the gang.
quotes.author: Mary Kay Ash

quotes.quote: Don’t find fault, find a remedy.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: A leader’s job is not to do the work for others, it’s to help others figure out how to do it themselves, to get things done, and to succeed beyond what they thought possible.
quotes.author: Simon Sinek

quotes.quote: The only safe ship in a storm is leadership.
quotes.author: Faye Wattleton

quotes.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.quote: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Do one thing every day that scares you.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
quotes.author: Christian D. Larson

quotes.quote: You become what you believe.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: In order to succeed, we must first believe that we can.
quotes.author: Nikos Kazantzakis

quotes.quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot, but make it hot by striking.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: Investing in yourself is the best investment you will ever make. It will not only improve your life, it will improve the lives of all those around you.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: You are your only limit.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The more you know yourself, the more clarity there is. Self-knowledge has no end.
quotes.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quotes.quote: The biggest room in the world is the room for improvement.
quotes.author: Helmut Schmidt

quotes.quote: Yesterday I was clever, so I wanted to change the world. Today I am wise, so I am changing myself.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Anytime you start to miss her and want to text her remember that there's a guy on her phone who doesn't have to text her first.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.

quotes.quote: Yesterday I was clever, so I wanted to change the world. Today I am wise, so I am changing myself.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Anytime you start to miss her and want to text her remember that there's a guy on the phone who doesn't have to text her first.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: We cannot become what we want by remaining what we are.
quotes.author: Max DePree

quotes.quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
quotes.author: Chris Grosser

quotes.quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: I am not what happened to me, I am what I choose to become.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: There is no greater agony than bearing an untold story inside you.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Your limitation—it's only your imagination.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Dream big and dare to fail.
quotes.author: Norman Vaughan

quotes.quote: What we achieve inwardly will change outer reality.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.quote: Courage is resistance to fear, mastery of fear—not absence of fear.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

quotes.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Don't count the days, make the days count.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
quotes.author: George Addair
